Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.clientModel

Class PlayerClientModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.clientModel.PlayerClientModel
public class PlayerClientModel extends Object
Class to store the simplified player model in the client The information are sent one by one with the Change messages from the server
